site.title: Dreamifly - Free AI Art Generator Online | One-Click Anime, Illustration, and Art Creation
site.description: Dreamifly is a free AI art website that requires no registration. It supports various styles including anime, illustration, and 3D art. Users can quickly generate high-quality images through text or reference images. As an advanced AI image generation tool, it provides a smooth and intelligent creative experience. Suitable for designers and art enthusiasts, making AI drawing easy and can generate images with AI anytime

subtitle.prefix: Powered by 30 distributed RTX 4090 GPUs from home computers,

hero.description: Dreamifly - Free AI Art Generator Online | One-Click Anime, Illustration, and Art Creation

generate.title: AI Image Generation
generate.description: Transform your ideas into beautiful images using our advanced HiDream-I1 model

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe what you want to see (English recommended, Chinese only supported by HiDream model)...

form.negativePromptPlaceholder: Describe what you don't want to see (optional)

model.label: Model
model.hint: Select the AI model to use

descriptions.HiDream-full-fp16: HiDream-I1 is one of the most outstanding and advanced models in the AI art field, developed by Beijing Zhixiang Future Technology Co., Ltd.
descriptions.HiDream-full-fp8: HiDream-I1 is one of the most outstanding and advanced models in the AI art field, developed by Beijing Zhixiang Future Technology Co., Ltd.
descriptions.Flux-Dev: FLUX.1-Dev is an open-source AI art model developed by Black Forest Labs, featuring powerful visual creation capabilities and excellent text understanding performance.
descriptions.Flux-Kontext: Flux Kontext[Dev] is a 12B parameter image editing model developed by Black Forest Labs, supporting precise editing with both text and image input.
descriptions.Flux-Krea: FLUX.1 Krea [dev] is an open-source text-to-image generation model jointly developed by Black Forest Labs (BFL) and Krea AI. This model aims to overcome common 'AI taste' issues in traditional AI image generation such as 'over-saturation', 'over-exposed highlights', and 'plastic feel', pursuing more realistic and diverse outputs.
descriptions.Stable-Diffusion-35: Stable Diffusion 3.5 is an upgraded text-to-image model launched by Stability AI, featuring an improved diffusion architecture, support for higher resolutions, optimized prompt understanding and detail generation, capable of producing more realistic and coherent images.
descriptions.Qwen-Image: Qwen-Image is the first image generation foundation model released by Alibaba's Tongyi Qianwen team, based on MMDiT architecture with 20B parameters and open-sourced. The model not only supports realistic, anime, cyberpunk and other style image generation and style transfer, but also has capabilities for image content editing, detail enhancement and text addition. Qwen-Image has made progress in text rendering and can maintain visual details and semantic coherence of non-edited areas during the editing process.
descriptions.Qwen-Image-Edit: Qwen-Image-Edit is an image editing model developed by Alibaba's Tongyi Qianwen team, specifically designed for image content editing and modification. The model supports text-instruction-based image editing, capable of precisely understanding editing requirements while maintaining the overall style and details of the image.
descriptions.Wai-SDXL-V150: A third-party community model based on SDXL and the Brilliant series, specializing in drawing anime-style characters.
descriptions.Z-Image-Turbo: Z-Image-Turbo is a fast text-to-image model with Chinese support, based on Lumina2 architecture, capable of quickly generating high-quality images, especially suitable for Chinese prompt input.
descriptions.Flux-2: Flux-2 is the latest text-to-image generation model developed by Black Forest Labs, featuring an improved architecture and more powerful CLIP encoder, capable of generating higher quality and more detailed images.

steps.label: Steps
steps.hint: Higher steps may improve details but increase generation time (10-32)

batch_size.label: Batch Size
batch_size.hint: Number of images to generate at once (1-2)

denoising_strength.label: Denoising Strength
denoising_strength.hint: Controls how much of the reference image to preserve (0-1)

questions.a: Dreamifly is a completely free online service based on multiple AI art models, supporting both text-to-image and image-to-image generation. It is an excellent AI design and drawing tool, supporting various styles such as realistic, anime, illustration, and 3D. Feel free to unleash your creativity here!
Yes, we provide completely free image generation services.

questions.q: What kind of images can Dreamifly create?
questions.a: Various styles, realistic scenes, artistic illustrations, anime-style portraits, and more.

questions.q: Can I use Dreamifly-generated images for commercial purposes?
questions.a: Yes, you have full rights to use the generated images for both personal and commercial purposes.
HiDream-I1 Full Version, Flux.1-Dev, and more open-source models in the future.

questions.q: Do I need to create an account and log in to use Dreamifly?
questions.a: No, you can directly use our image generation features.

terms.title: Dreamifly Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

section1.title: I. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to Dreamifly (hereinafter referred to as "this platform"). This agreement is entered into between Dreamifly operators (hereinafter referred to as "we") and you (the user). By using this platform, you agree to: (1) comply with all terms of this agreement; (2) authorize us to collect and use your data in accordance with this policy; (3) accept our handling measures for violations.
section1.note: If you do not agree, please stop using immediately.

section2.title: II. User Conduct Standards
section2.intro: You promise that when using this platform:

subsection1.title: 2.1 Prohibited Content
subsection1.item1: Content that violates laws, regulations, or public order and morals (such as violence, pornography, hate speech, infringement of others' rights)
subsection1.item2: Content that infringes intellectual property rights (such as unauthorized celebrity portraits, copyrighted art styles)
subsection1.item3: False information or content that may cause social harm (such as deepfakes, politically sensitive content)
subsection1.item4: Other content that violates this platform's Content Safety Guidelines (see [link])

subsection2.title: 2.2 Violation Handling Measures
subsection2.intro: If users generate prohibited content, we have the right to:
subsection2.item1: Immediately ban accounts (including temporary or permanent bans)
subsection2.item2: Delete prohibited content and associated data
subsection2.item3: Report to regulatory authorities (if involving illegal activities)
subsection2.note: Ban decisions are final and not subject to appeal (except for major misjudgments).

row1.col2: Email/phone number, username (for login and notifications)

row2.col2: Input prompts, generated images, operation logs (for content moderation and model optimization)

row3.col2: IP address, device model, usage frequency, feature clickstream (for security and product improvement)

row4.col2: User complaints, report content (for violation handling and model tuning)

subsection2.title: 3.2 Data Use Purposes
subsection2.item1: Core purposes: Provide AI generation services, content safety review, account management
subsection2.item2: Optimization purposes: Improve AI model performance, develop new features, enhance user experience
subsection2.item3: Compliance purposes: Fulfill legal obligations, cooperate with regulatory investigations, handle user disputes

subsection3.title: 3.3 User Authorization
subsection3.item1: Automatically analyze your submitted prompts and generated images (including AI recognition and manual sampling) for: (a) real-time detection of prohibited content; (b) training/optimizing Dreamifly AI models (Note: Generated images used for training undergo desensitization and do not contain personally identifiable information); (c) platform security protection (such as identifying malicious attacks and abuse)

subsection4.title: 3.4 Data Sharing and Disclosure
subsection4.intro: No sharing: Except for the following situations, we will never sell or share your data with third parties;
subsection4.item1: Necessary sharing: Cloud service providers, content moderation service providers (with confidentiality agreements)
subsection4.item2: When required by judicial authorities in accordance with the law
subsection4.item3: Control change scenarios such as corporate mergers (data security must be guaranteed)

section4.title: IV. Privacy Protection Measures
section4.item1: Technical safeguards: Data transmission encryption (TLS), storage encryption, access control
section4.item2: Retention period: Account data retained for 1 year after account deletion; Generated content retained until violation risk is removed (usually â‰¤6 months)
section4.item3: Your rights: You can export/delete personal data in account settings at any time (except data required to be retained by law)

section5.title: V. Disclaimer
section5.item1: AI-generated content may have deviations, and the platform does not guarantee content accuracy or legality
section5.item2: Users are solely responsible for legal liability arising from inputting prohibited prompts
section5.item3: For data breaches caused by force majeure (such as hacker attacks, policy changes), we will notify promptly but do not assume compensation liability

section6.title: VI. Agreement Updates
section6.content: We may update this agreement based on legal or business adjustments. After updates, we will notify through:
section6.note: Continued use is deemed acceptance of new terms.
